show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: A History Lesson
content:
David Stockman’s account of how World War 1 was the turning point between the previous era of sound money and the... <!--more--> crazed, debt-ridden 100-year joyride we have experienced since.
His view of the origins of the Great Depression are as fascinating as they are original.
History’s financial scoundrels are laid bare.
He shows us how the ill-conceived “Great War” directly caused the fateful military conflagrations of the twentieth and twenty-first centuries.
A few words about the employment figures and how they are nothing more than a grotesque sham designed to fool you.
More evidence that the so-called ‘recovery’ is a fake.
